results.title: Effect of metformin on sleep disorders in adolescent girls with polycystic ovarian syndrome.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ administration resulted in significant decrease in the body weight, body mass index, @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@ score, fasting and postprandial blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, fasting serum @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, HOMA index, @DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep disturbances@@@ scale, and Epworth @<m>DISEASE_Sleepiness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077260 @@@sleepiness@@@ scale compared to the untreated @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ group.

citations.NLM: El-Sharkawy AA, Abdelmotaleb GS, Aly MK, Kabel AM. Effect of metformin on sleep disorders in adolescent girls with polycystic ovarian syndrome. J Pediatr Adolesc Gynecol. 2014 Dec;27(6):347-52. PMID: 25256878
citations.BibTeX: @article{25256878, title={Effect of metformin on sleep disorders in adolescent girls with polycystic ovarian syndrome.}, author={El-Sharkawy AA and Abdelmotaleb GS and Aly MK and Kabel AM}, journal={J Pediatr Adolesc Gynecol}, volume={27}, number={6}, pages={347-52}}
